prompt:
['CONFIDENTIAL', '1) Have patient use the affected hand to hold dollar bills while the unaffected hand', 'counts them out', '2) Have the unaffected hand hold onto the bills while the affected hand counts', 'them out.', 'b.', 'Coins: Start with quarters and move to dimes.', '1) Pick up and hold change in the affected hand not allowing the coins to fall out', 'of the palm.', '2) Hold the coins in the palm of the affected hand and feed them out one at a time', 'utilizing the thumb and index finger.', '3) Stack the coins on top of each other utilizing the affected hand.', '4) Find coins in pocket using the affected hand', '20. Typing', 'a.', 'Type one handed with affected hand hitting the keys', 'b. Utilize both hands during typing tasks', '21. Calculator Use', 'a. This may be graded by using a larger calculator and then moving to a smaller one.', 'b.
